title: Just For Fun
description: She needs a date to some swanky something-or-other. He’s more of a fish-sticks-and-denim guy. But for a woman who’s not afraid to get naughty in an elevator at a charity fundraiser, he can stand a couple days of smoked salmon and Armani.With their chemistry there’s no doubt they can pull off a fake relationship. They just need to remember that in the end, they’re going in very opposite directions.But what could go wrong? It’s just a weekend. It’s just this one time. It’s just for fun.**this book was previously published as Just For Fun, the Bradfords book 4**
author: Erin Nicholas
